name: Garlic Pasta
author: Greg
summary: Pasta with herbs, delicious sauteed garlic, and plenty of freshly grated Parmesan cheese. Chop the garlic so that some is minced and some is larger pieces. You can substitute 1 tablespoon Italian seasoning blend for the fresh herbs.
ingredients: 1 medium head garlic, peeled and chopped
directions: Bring a large pot of lightly salted water to a boil
Cook pasta in boiling water for 8 to 10 minutes, or until al dente; drain
In a skillet, saute garlic in oil on low heat, just hot enough to make the garlic sizzle; about 10 to 15 minutes
Season with basil, oregano, parsley, and crushed red pepper, and remove from heat
In a large bowl, toss cooked pasta with garlic and herb mixture, and let sit for 3 to 5 minutes
